WRITING.TITLE: Disapearing levels
WRITING.TEXT: I turned off my game for the first time and just went back, I've lost loads of credits and 11 levels, happened to anyone else?
It was funny when Chase said Sis
Who feeds Slade in that cell?
Imagine if he missed when he shot open the cell
Oliver was great in the episode, the scene with chase in the cell, scenes with Malcolm etc
The bit in the car was funny, even though that should be killed them
